item.title: Report X-2023061484
item.description:
Report X-2023061484

Identified by scraper @ 2023-07-19T21:09:22+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2023-06-14
  • City: CEDAR RAPIDS
  • State: IA
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: Fedex Ground Package System, Inc.
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: SequenceEvent: During unloading the package, it was apparent that it was leaking in the corner. DescribePack: It cannot be seen but its leaking under the top of the container. The caps on the top look fine but they are leaking. DurationRel: 1 and MitigateEffect: Red Hazmat tote was used and very little spilled.
